title: Provide an Order Status Update
description: A retailer calls to get the status of a recent order.

tasks.description: Identify the retailer and their order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order in the system.

tasks.description: Check the real-time status of the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the order has been packed and is awaiting carrier pickup.

tasks.description: Inform the retailer of the current status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent tells the retailer their order is scheduled to ship today.
